title: Enna Oru Enna Oru Lyrics Pattathu Yaanai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Enna Oru Enna Oru
Singer: Karthik
Movie: Pattathu Yaanai
Music: Thaman S
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Enna oru enna oru azhagiyada
kanna vittu kanna vittu vilagalada

Manasa thaakura minnalum avathaan
marayil theriyura jannalum avathaan
kanavil pookura thaamara avathaan
kadhayil ketkura dhevadha avathaan

Enna peru enna oosru ketkalada
enga pora enga poraa paakalada

Munnadi avalum pinnaadi naanum
oru murai thirumbi paarthaa enna
Thundaana manasa onnaaka thaaney
marupadi avala keteney

Enna oru enna oru azhagiyada
kanna vittu kanna vittu vilagalada

Raavu kaalathula nalla neram varuma
onbathu patharayil sirichaa
pillayaaru kovilukku thenga
onnu udaikka manasu venduchu pudhusaa

Inchu inchaa idaiveli kuranji
idhayam parakudhu lesaa
England-u raani pola thangathula elachu
vazha vaipen mass-aa

Avalai paarkira yaarumey avalai
marandhum kooda marapadhu siramam
Peepi oodhanum neratha solladi
BP yerudhu seekiram solladi

Enna oru enna oru azhagiyada
kanna vittu kanna vittu vilagalada
va enazhage va en uyire
va en mayiley .. oh oh ..
va uyire Â va en enazhage
va en mayiley .. oh oh .. va

Oh... thillai nagaraa theradi theruvaa
angirukka un veedu
Saradhas-u koorapattu sela vangi tharuven
vetkapattu ennai thaedu

Thannanthaniya vazhvadhu paavam
vandhu maalaya podu
thandavaalam pola naama
rendu perukidayil naduvil
edhukadi kodu

Manasil kattura maaliga veedu
vaasal kolam vandhu ne podu

Peepi oodhanum neratha solladi
BP yerudhu seekiram solladi

Enna oru ... azhagiyada
kanna vittu .. vilagalada
konjam kooda konjam kooda palagalada
engaluku ippa rendu kuzhandhayada
